function.NAME: 民用合同签订
function.SQL: select a.f_username,a.f_state, round((sysdate - p.plandate),0) as days from t_apply a left join t_proschstep p on p.applyid = a.id and p.stepname = a.f_state where a.f_state='合同签订' and p.plandate is not null and p.finishdate is null and (sysdate - p.plandate ) > 0
